title: Mobile Troubleshooting - No Service While Roaming
description: A customer traveling internationally reports having no service, despite having a roaming plan.

tasks.description: Verify the customer has an active international roaming package.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the 'Global Pass' is active on the account.

tasks.description: Instruct the customer to manually search for and select a partner network on their device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides instructions for manual network selection on iOS/Android.

tasks.description: If manual selection fails, check for any international service blocks on the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds no blocks and confirms the service should be working.
